short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be notified and monitor all currency exchange rates in one place conveniently!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Exchange Rate Agent? 

Exchange Rate Agent is a free tool developed to monitor multiple exchange rate currencies in a convenient way. It automatically refreshes data and has the currency converter for multiple types of currency pairs. It supports exchange rate notification for each currency pair.

What are the data resources of Exchange Rate Agent?

Exchange Rate Agent data resources are pulled from trusted and reliable foreign exchange API providers. However the accuracy of the rates was continuously being monitored and I recommend verifying the currency rates before performing any type of transfers and transactions. 

What are the core features of Exchange Rate Agent?

1. Simple, straightforward and clean interface.
2. Customizable and user-friendly.
3. Convenient to use.
4. Support multiple currency pairs.
5. Useful features.

For more information, kindly visit the links below:

Documentations - https://www.xr8-agent.com/docs
Changelogs - https://www.xr8-agent.com/changelog
Queries, reports and suggestions - https://www.xr8-agent.com/contact
